description:
The Turnaround Thinking Programâ„¢ is a no frills high impact massive open online course (MOOC) that enables leaders and employees to free themselves up to create naturally sustainable profits & realise the very best from themselves and their peers.

The program strengthens what we are already great at as well as making us aware of the traits that hold us back. This opens up the exciting opportunity to remove the barriers which enables us to become far more successful.

The content is delivered from the award winning CEOs mouth, the content gets back to basics: it has been proven and refined during 150 years of experience accumulated by one of the UKs most successful team of business transformation professionals and simplified for anyone in business to benefit.

Tom Pickering is a Cranfield and Ashridge MBA masterclass leader in business transformation and CEO who walks the talk.

This is part 2 of 2 that shows some counterintuitive but proven approaches that create double digit performance improvement.
title: Turnaround Thinking Masterclass 2: Transforming Profits
